## ColorEncoding.thematicSchemePath property

Path of the color on theme.scheme. Includes support for indexed palettes, e.g., 'nominal\[1\]'. This is very rudimentary, but allows us to recompute the color if the theme changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
thematicSchemePath?: string;
```
